com.engiweb.profilemanager.common.ruleengine.action.reorganize.accesscertifier

Class EntitlementReviewAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.engiweb.profilemanager.common.ruleengine.action.reorganize.accesscertifier.EntitlementReviewAction

  • public final class EntitlementReviewAction
extends java.lang.Object
    Class used to manage 'EntitlementReviewAction' entities through Drools rules engine

    • Method Detail

      • findReview

        public static <any> findReview(DAO sql,
                               EntitlementReviewBean entitlementReviewBean,
                               EntitlementReviewOption entitlementReviewOption,
                               AttestationBean attestationBean,
                               UserBean reviewerUser,
                               Paging paging)
                        throws java.lang.Exception
        The method returns a Beanlist containing the entitlement to review according to the filters given.
        Parameters:
        sql - mandatory connection parameter
        entitlementReviewBean - entitlement to review filter
        entitlementReviewOption - object used to specify review criteria to use in the search. Attestation object parameter MUST be set.
        reviewerUser - user reviewer, mandatory and uniquely defined.
        paging - used to page the search
        Returns:
        list of entitlement to review found
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • approve

        public static void approve(DAO sql,
                           java.lang.String note,
                           UserBean reviewerUser,
                           <any> blReviewBean)
                    throws java.lang.Exception
        The method approves the review of the given list of entitlements assigned to the reviewer given. It is possible to add a note to the approved entitlement reviews.
        Parameters:
        sql - mandatory connection parameter
        note - note of the approval
        reviewerUser - user reviewer, mandatory and defined uniquely
        blReviewBean - list of entitlement reviews to approve, mandatory and each defined uniquely
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • revoke

        public static void revoke(DAO sql,
                          java.lang.String note,
                          UserBean reviewerUser,
                          <any> blReviewBean)
                   throws java.lang.Exception
        The method rejects the review of the list of entitlements assigned to the reviewer given. It is possible to add a note to the revoked entitlements. Depending by the configuration of the attestation, the presence of the note could be mandatory or not. The effectiveness of the revocation depends by the configuration of the attestation and is, in any case, subsequent to the sign off operation.
        Parameters:
        sql - mandatory connection parameter
        note - note of revoke, depending by the configuration of the attestation, it could be mandatory or not
        reviewerUser - user reviewer, mandatory and defined uniquely
        blReviewBean - list of entitlements to revoke, mandatory and each defined uniquely
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • redirect

        public static void redirect(DAO sql,
                            ReviewNoteBean noteBean,
                            AttestationBean attestationBean,
                            <any> entitlementReviewBeans)
                     throws java.lang.Exception
        The method redirects the review of the list of entitlements assigned, to the reviewer given, to the new reviewer specified. The original reviewer becomes secondary and is enabled to get the attestation back if the new reviewer decides to return the review. It is possible to add a note to the redirection.
        Parameters:
        sql - mandatory connection parameter
        noteBean - note of redirect
        attestationBean - attestationBean, mandatory and defined uniquely
        entitlementReviewBeans - list of entitlement reviews to redirect, mandatory and each defined uniquely
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • escalate

        public static void escalate(DAO sql,
                            ReviewNoteBean noteBean,
                            AttestationBean attestationBean,
                            <any> entitlementReviewBeans)
                     throws java.lang.Exception
        The method escalates the list of entitlement reviews associated to the reviewer given to the supervisor of the attestation. It is possible to add a note to the escalation.
        Parameters:
        sql - mandatory connection parameter
        attestationBean - user reviewer, mandatory and defined uniquely
        entitlementReviewBeans - list of entitlement reviews to escalate, mandatory and each defined uniquely
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • signOff

        public static void signOff(DAO sql,
                           UserBean reviewerUser,
                           <any> entitlementReviewBeans)
                    throws java.lang.Exception
        The method does the signoff of the entitlement reviews associated to the reviewer given. The signoff operation put an end to the reviewing work on the entitlement. It is possible to add a note to the entitlement reviews signed off.
        Parameters:
        sql - mandatory connection parameter
        reviewerUser - user reviewer, mandatory and defined uniquely
        entitlementReviewBeans - list of entitlement reviews to sign off, mandatory and each defined uniquely
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • findApplication

        public static <any> findApplication(DAO sql,
                                    ApplicationBean applicationBean,
                                    EntitlementBean entitlementBean,
                                    UserBean reviewerUser,
                                    AttestationBean attestationBean,
                                    Paging paging)
                             throws java.lang.Exception
        The method returns a Beanlist containing the applications included into the attestation given which is assigned to the reviewer given. It is possible to filter by application and entitlement.
        Parameters:
        sql - mandatory connection parameter
        applicationBean - application filter
        entitlementBean - entitlement filter
        reviewerUser - user reviewer, mandatory and defined uniquely
        attestationBean - attestation filter, mandatory and defined uniquely
        paging -
        Returns:
        list of applications found
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • findReviewHistory

        public static <any> findReviewHistory(DAO sql,
                                      java.lang.String entitlementName,
                                      java.lang.String entitlementCode,
                                      java.lang.String applicationName,
                                      EntitlementType entitlementType,
                                      ReviewStatus reviewStatus,
                                      Paging paging)
                               throws java.lang.Exception
        The method returns a Beanlist containing the history of the reviews of entitlements according to the filter given.
        Parameters:
        sql - mandatory connection parameter
        entitlementName - The entitlement name
        entitlementCode - The entitlement code
        applicationName - The application name
        entitlementType - EntitlementType The entitlement type
        reviewStatus - ReviewStatus the review status
        paging -
        Returns:
        list of entitlement history beans found
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • findNote

        public static <any> findNote(DAO sql,
                             ReviewNoteBean reviewNoteBean,
                             EntitlementReviewBean entitlementReviewBean,
                             Paging paging)
                      throws java.lang.Exception
        The method returns a Beanlist containing the note beans associated to entitlement review given. It is possible to filter by review note bean.
        Parameters:
        sql - mandatory connection parameter
        reviewNoteBean - review note filter
        entitlementReviewBean - entitlement review filter, mandatory and defined uniquely
        paging -
        Returns:
        list of note beans found
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • updateNote

        public static void updateNote(DAO sql,
                              java.lang.String note,
                              UserBean reviewerUser,
                              <any> blReviewBean)
                       throws java.lang.Exception
        The method updates the review note of the entitlement reviews given created by the reviewer given with the note provided.
        Parameters:
        sql - mandatory connection parameter
        note - note to update
        reviewerUser - user reviewer, mandatory and defined uniquely
        blReviewBean - list of entitlement reviews target of the note update
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • findReviewer

        public static <any> findReviewer(DAO sql,
                                 boolean hierarchy,
                                 OrgUnitBean ouBean,
                                 UserBean userBean,
                                 AttestationBean attestationBean,
                                 Paging paging)
                          throws java.lang.Exception
        The method returns a Beanlist containing the users which are the reviewers of the attestation given. It is possible to filter by user and organization unit. The hierarchy boolean flag is used with the organization unit filter and specify if the it must be used for a punctual or hierarchical search.
        Parameters:
        sql - mandatory connection parameter
        hierarchy - boolean flag used to specify if the organization unit filter must be used for a punctual or hierarchical search
        ouBean - organization unit filter
        userBean - user filter
        attestationBean - attestation filter, mandatory and defined uniquely
        paging -
        Returns:
        list of reviewers of the given attestation
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • findReviewStats

        public static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> findReviewStats(DAO sql,
                                                                                    UserBean userBean,
                                                                                    AttestationBean attestationBean)
                                                                             throws java.lang.Exception
        The method returns a map with stat names as keyset and stat values as valueset.
        Parameters:
        sql - mandatory connection parameter
        userBean - user filter, mandatory and defined uniquely
        attestationBean - attestation filter, mandatory and defined uniquely
        Returns:
        map
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

                            UserBean reviewerUser,
                            <any> blReviewBean)
